name: This Strange Realm Of Mine
description: This Strange Realm Of Mine is a First Person Shooter mixed with poetry and psychological horror. Graphic style is 3D mixed with pixel art.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 275 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 2 GB available space
